ValidationRule.description: Prevents changes to Requested ARV LTV, Requested Max Reno Cost Reimbursement, and Requested Reno Limit (% Acq Cost) if the LOC deal's Product Subtype field = No Renovation.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Record_Type_Name__c = "LOC_Loan", TEXT(Product_Sub_Type__c) = "No Renovation", OR( ISCHANGED( Requested_ARV_LTV__c ), ISCHANGED ( Requested_Max_Reno_Cost_Reimbursement__c ), ISCHANGED( Requested_Reno_Limit__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This deal is a No Renovation LOC so you cannot change any of the following fields: the Requested ARV LTV, Requested Max Reno Cost Reimbursement, or Requested Reno Limit (% Acq Cost).
